Package utilities

This package holds some useful tools, which are designed to be re-usable in many projects.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Database
    This class contains methods which interact with a SQL database using a JDBC driver.
    Dialogs
    This class contains methods for invoking different dialogs.
    Serial
    This class contains methods for serialization and deserialization.
    Settings
    This class contains methods for writing settings to and reading settings from a file.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DatabaseCommand
    This enum holds all the possible database commands.
    Unit
    This enum holds measurement units.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidDataException
    This exception is thrown, when invalid, or malformed data is encountered.

Package utilities Description

This package holds some useful tools, which are designed to be re-usable in many projects. Capabilities include:
-JDBC connection to SQL database
-Writing/Reading settings to/from file
-Popping up dialogs
-Invalid Data Exception
-Serialization and Deserialization
-Enums for: Database Commands, Measurement Units
